item.title: Npc follow you/pet
item.dc:creator: @issac issac
item.description:
@issac wrote:

i made a command for pets that follow. so if you have a specified level you can use the command and summon your pet. the only proublem is that if you teleport the pet has to walk the whole way there. i want to know how i could make it so if you teleport the pet teleports with you.

this is the code i use.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cat”) && playerLevel[19] >= 30) {
server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(771, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId);
summonedNPCS++;
actionTimer = 99999999;

Read full topic
